org.usb4java

Class DescriptorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usb4java.DescriptorUtils

  • public final class DescriptorUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods used for descriptor dumps.
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)

    • Method Detail

      • getUSBClassName

        public static String getUSBClassName(byte usbClass)
        Returns the name of the specified USB class. "unknown" is returned for a class which is unknown to libusb.
        Parameters:
        usbClass - The numeric USB class.
        Returns:
        The USB class name.

      • decodeBCD

        public static String decodeBCD(short bcd)
        Decodes a binary-coded decimal into a string and returns it.
        Parameters:
        bcd - The binary-coded decimal to decode.
        Returns:
        The decoded binary-coded decimal.

      • dump

        public static String dump(ByteBuffer bytes)
        Dumps the specified byte buffer into a hex string and returns it.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The bytes to dump.
        Returns:
        The hex dump.

      • dump

        public static String dump(DeviceDescriptor descriptor)
        Dumps the specified USB device descriptor into a string and returns it.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - The USB device descriptor to dump.
        Returns:
        The descriptor dump.

      • dump

        public static String dump(DeviceDescriptor descriptor,
          String manufacturer,
          String product,
          String serial)
        Dumps the specified USB device descriptor into a string and returns it.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - The USB device descriptor to dump.
        manufacturer - The manufacturer string or null if unknown.
        product - The product string or null if unknown.
        serial - The serial number strsing or null if unknown.
        Returns:
        The descriptor dump.

      • dump

        public static String dump(ConfigDescriptor descriptor)
        Dumps the specified USB configuration descriptor into a string and returns it.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - The USB configuration descriptor to dump.
        Returns:
        The descriptor dump.

        public static String dump(InterfaceDescriptor descriptor)
